data.text: @JosephShmoe17 @skybabyjo_jo I'll agree to disagree.I personally think the mandates should have ended once vaccines were made available, because people were given a choice to protect themselves.However, studies were shown that mandates helped slow the spread before we had effective vaccines or treatments.

@JosephShmoe17 @notannade You know, science - political science. What's painful is that a lot of them still won't open their eyes to what's going on instead they'll just block you just like @notannade did haha.

@notannade @skybabyjo_jo Never should have had even one mandate period.  Should have just warned folk with co-morbidities to protect themselves and not destroyed economies and freedom.  Life is easier when not taking memes literally, but as making a statement with sarcasm/humor.

@JosephShmoe17 @skybabyjo_jo Also,  I've been living my life perfectly normally since vaccination.  Eat out,  going to sporting events,  gym, travel,  etc. A mask literally does not prevent you from doing those things haha.
@JosephShmoe17 @notannade They act like they don't know already.

@JosephShmoe17 @skybabyjo_jo Which is why mandates are decreasing, along with evidence that omicron is less deadly and the peak is over. Your meme stated covid disappeared.  It didn't.  I was responding to that,  not making a statement that people can't or shouldn't live their lives.

@notannade @skybabyjo_jo The CDC (Wilensky) reported about a month ago that 75% of Covid deaths included 4 or more co-morbidities.  If that describes you, then stay home/protect yourself.  330 million people shouldnâ€™t be subject to mandates geared towards a minority.

@skybabyjo_jo @JosephShmoe17 Lolz that you still are crying fake news after 2 years and unlimited scientific and peer reviewed studies that go beyond FOX or CNN reporting.  Good luck with your brain washing. All hail chief clown 🤡
@notannade @JosephShmoe17 I guess CNN hasn't reported that yet so just hold on.
@notannade @JosephShmoe17 You don't understand what it means to "die from" and "die with"
